title: Collaborative Partnership-Based Information Technology Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Cultivates IT application skills through collaborative learning in a simulation environment resembling real work settings. Strengthens the integration of theory and practice via VR-based problem-solving activities.

learning_goals: Using information retrieval strategies, learners can solve at least 80% of given problems in VR simulation environments.
Learners can structure information analysis results in a formal report format through collaborative learning partnerships.
Learners can correct errors in the information technology application process within three attempts using simulation assessment tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
